Cards.Title: Kingslayer
Cards.description: Kingslayer is a video game made in Godot with a mix of gdscript and C#. This was a group project and can be found on Github.

Cards.Title: Slapshot Training Packs
Cards.description: A Game mod made to add training packs for the players of slapshot made with C# making use of .Net dll's

Cards.Title: Tic Tac Toe
Cards.description: A tic tac toe game with an ai that will play you, and always win or tie. This was made with react.
